values: Today 97.1 had Christmas in July and they played Christmas music all day until Delilah came on at night.  I was super excited and it basically made my life.  I had come home from work and was taking a nap in my room with my dog when my sister starts yelling that they are playing christmas music and at first I was like omg be quite I'm sleeping but then it registered that she said Christmas music and I was up in a second and was like what!  Basically I was very excited.  And that is the extent of my only real entry in the past year!

The rain here is ridiculous.

Our pool has overflowed and my dad has had to pump water out several times.

My dad couldn't go in to work on Monday because his Metro Stop was flooded- they said it was up to the platform where the people stand in water so no trains could run through Federal Triangle.  Also part of the beltway was closed because there was a mudslide or something.  So he turned around and came home and worked at home.  That's ridiculous!

Anyways this rain has made me want to absolutly nothing but I am forcing myself to work on my Spanish class so I can finish it before my cousins come next week.  I would have deffinitly failed this if it wasn't for the incomplete.  Isn't it sad that I am struggling to pass an online class through NOVA.  It is a good thing I didn't attempt to take spanish at vcu because I would have deffinitly failed.

We finally got a new computer downstairs after our other one died like a month ago.  So that means I have my computer back all to myself again yay!  My brother was putting tons of spywear and stuff on my computer because he goes to sketchy video game message boards and random stuff like that.

Hopefully my dad will go out and buy a car this weekend because of 4th of July sales.  He just needs to decide btw the BMW Z4or whatever the number is or the Mazda RX8or whatever the number is.  Because my brother keeps driving my car and its annoyingggggg.  He takes off my cds and messes up my mirrorsssss.  And if my dad buys the car soon then maybe I can talk him into letting me drive it down to the beach when we go down there.

I layed out and tanned today!!  First I was laying on the new chairs my dad bought by the pool.  Then my sister came home and we got the new floaty longer things that my dad bought and layed in the pool.  Except it was cold and when you lay on those things you sink into the water.  So we stayed by the steps and propped them up on the steps so we didn't float away to the bugs.  Then my mom came home and now I am waiting for her to change and we are gonig to curves.  Which is good because I need to loose weight so I can loose my tummy so i can wear my bikinni and so i can make my boobs smaller so i can also wear my bikinni.  But until that happens I have my 2 tankinis to hide my fat and my boobs fit into them.  The end!

Also I got really tan from laying out for like 2 and a half hours!  yay

Once you've been tagged, you have to write a blog with 6 weird facts/things/habits about yourself, saying who tagged you. In the end you need to choose the 6 people to be tagged and list their names. No tag backs.

tagged by... Maggie

1.  I get very obsessive over things, I get something in my head and I obsess over it until I get a new obsesssion.  Right now that obsession is Keith Urban, it has previously been getting a chihauhaua, planning my family vacations and various other random things.

2.  I love my puppy and kitties more then some of my friends.  They are like my family and one of the reasons I go home so much from school is because I miss my pets, especially my Prissy cat.  I've had my dog since I was like 5 and I really can't even remember when I haven't had him and when he dies I will probably like go into depression.

3.  I am lazy.  I am perfectly fine with sitting on the couch all day long and watching tv.  I hate school but I would rather go to school then get a job and work.  I fully plan on staying in school as long as I can stretch it out and get my paretns to pay for it so I don't have to get a job.  I am going to be a teacher so I don't have to work during the summers.  As soon as I find a husband and get married I plan on not working anymore.

4.  I sleep a lot.  Like I can't wake up before 10 and feel rested no matter when I go to bed.  Since I've been home I've been gonig to bed at like 11 or 11:30 because thats when everyone else in my family goes to bed and I don't have anything else to do.  And even then I wake up at like 11.  I get like 12 hours of sleep and I still could sleep longer.  If I don't get like at least 9 hours of sleep I am not in a good mood the next day and I have to take a nap.

5.  I have like fear of doing things by myself.  I hate going places by myself, like the grocery store or the doctor.  I am slowly getting over this because my mom won't go with me anymore.  But I usually take my sister or Maggie to the grocery store with me.

6.  I hate talking on the phone to people I don't know.  That is why I don't want to work at Temp Solutions anymore.  Like my pulse races and I get really nervous whenever the phone starts ringing.  This also happens when my mom makes me schedule appointments or anything.  And my dad gets realy mad because I don't call people and he blames it on aim and me never actually talking to people and I imagine that probably does have something to do with it.

Oh and I don't have any other friends to tag to do this because Maggie is the only one on here so the end!

I love being at home and not having anything to do!  All my finals went well and I think I got an A in archaeolgoy and a B in history and I think I somehow pulled an A out of my education class but I'm not sure because I didn't think that was possible.

Anyways when I am home I cook and my mom loves it because she can stay later at work and not have to worry about dinner lol.  I made Rachel Rays Not-sanga veggie pasta tonight lol.  It was scrumptious and for dessert I made these really cute white chocloate dessert cups filled with chocolate mousey kind of stuff.  It was so fun- Maggie we wil have to make them sometime lol.

Tommarow I am chaparoning my mom's class's field trip to the Manassas Battelfield!  haha I feel bad for these kids, when I was in 5th grade we went to Gettysburg.  These poor kids get to go 5 min down the road to the same battlefield they have driven past probaly every day for their entire lives.  They get to go watch the lame movie and walk around- lol and suprisingly I think that I have never actually walked around at the Battelfield- seen the movie yes but usually me and my siblings would complain enough we wouldn't walk around.  Plus Thomas says there are some kind of bugs that eat you in the grass and thats why they can't do reenactments there- lol thats why they did a reenactment of the battle of manassas way up in winchester or wherever and not in manassas lol.

Anyways I suppose I should go to bed so I can get up early tommarow to go to the field trip lol.

5 days until Rockbridge!  I am so excited!! Although if Emily wasn't a small group leader it would be 5 days until Hawaii but Emily has to go to Rockbridge because shes on leadership which means we can't go crash her dads business trip to Hawaii how saddddd lol

Well tommarow is the last day of the last full week of class.  I just want to go home and lay in bed forever.  I hate vcu, i hate finals, i hate stress, i hate springtime and living situations for next semester.

i want to drop out and marry keith urban and go on tour with him and maggie needs to marry chad so she can come on tour too.  so when we get sick of seeing the same concert over and over we can go out and have girls nights when we need a break from the guys.  Because why would we need to see a concert when we can have them give us our own? 

on second thought, maybe we need to be there so they don't act like pat green did last night and ask to see other girls boobs and get drunk lol, i don't think his wife was there because he deffinitly didn't act like that at keith urban because his wife was backstage with his daughter lol.

So I just watched Gilmore Girls and decided that Adam Broody needs to make a reapearance for like 1 episode.  I think it would be pretty fabulous.  Lane just got married and it would be pretty funny if Dave aka Adam Brody came back and like shook things up a little- kind of like Anna is doing on the OC.  Anyways that would be fabulous as would Supernatural getting cancelled and Jared Padalecki aka Dean coming back on Gilmore Girls.

Anyways last night was fabulous.  After being 30 min late for iv because of dinner coming out at 7 when iv started lol.  After iv we had ice cream outside of the commons in the little plaza thing and some people played frisbee for a while then we went to Belle Isle to have a bonfire for EC's birthday.  It was fabulous but now I am dying.  The smoke, not taking allergy medicine until way later then normal, and the lack of sleep has all combined to make me feel like i'm dying.

So this morning woke up showered and went to Tropical Smoothie then drove home.  It took me foreverrrrrr because it was raining and nobody knows how to drive in the rain.  Ridiculous people driving 60 miles an hour in the left lane i wanted to run them overrrrrr.  Now I am watching Gilmore Girls and slowly dying the end!

Also in our newspaper box today was a cute little flyer from the girl up the street because she is selling lemonaide today and tommarow and it had a little map and everything it was so cute and my brother and sister just walked up to see if she was actually out there lol.  Anyways thats it Maggie you have to tell me what is happening with your housing situation because I am dying over hereeeee

Since I've gotten an incomplete for my spanish i have a lot more time on my hands!  So lately my days have been filled with hanging out with Maggie and Emily and lots of fun things, including of course Tropical Smoothie since Lent is over.

Anyways housing is stressfull but as long as Maggie lives across from me I will be fine.

I hate allergies and Richmond and I can't wait until 2 weeks when I am done!  Then I get to go home for a week to relax then Rockbridge for an amazing week with lots of fun people!  Then home for the rest of the summer!  yay

This was a pathetic update but thats okay.

So yesterday was quite fun.

Went to education class got my presentation over with so now I don't have to worry about anything else in that class except the final.

Went to Target to buy cotton balls and some belts but they were sold out of cotton balls?  and they had no cute belts, instead I bought nail polish remover that didn't require cotton balls and some more stuff thatI can't think of right now.

Came back and did homework until Emily Fisher showed up at like 6ish.  We decided to go to Taco Bell and see Syriana at the Byrd.  But then it started pouring rain.  So we decided to order in food and borrow a movie from the guys downstairs lol.

So we spent forever looking though all the menus we have and decided to order from Sahara, it was scrumptious.  I got a Greek Salad and a Gyro and fried mushrooms and baklava.  hahha yes a lot of food and half of it is sitting in my refrigerator waiting to be eaten for dinner tonight.  Then we watched the Brothers Grimm with goregous Matt Damon and Heath Ledger who does not look so gorgeous in this movie because of his facial hair and glasses and lack of that long curly beautiful hair that makes him gorgeous to being with.  So we did that and watched the thunderstorm and it was fun fun.

The end!  haha

Okay so I was taking this political survey thing today and this is something that I just thought of that makes me kind of mad.

So when Hotel Rwanda came out everyone was like omg, how could that happen? how could the United States let that happen?   Why didn't we do anything?

But in Iraq there were similar things going on and now people are like why can't the United States mind their own business?  Why are we over there?  What are we doing?

Well you can't have it both ways, you have to make up your mind.  You can't be like oh the US should help and make sure people aren't being murdered and tortured in other countries and then be like don't send our troops overseas to help out.  The only difference is now there is a lable on it.  The US doesn't only send troops out to fight people, they send them out to help people.  If the us wasn't in Iraq all the people would be living in fear every day that they might be taken away by the government because they accidently said something bad about the government or some other reason.  The US along with the UN and Great Britian have helped to get rid of that opressing governemnt and are now helping the Iraquis set up a new one where they don't have to live in fear every day.  As part of that they need troops over there to help keep order until the new governemnt is established and recognized by the people.  So basically you can't be like oh lets spread world peace and help everyone have freedom in all countries and then be like I hate the president and I hate this war because you can't have it both ways.

Step 2: Post the first line from the first 20 songs that play, no matter how embarrassing the song.
Step 3: Post and let everyone you know guess what song and artist the lines come from.
Step 4: Strike out the songs when someone guesses correctly.

Also I have to meet with Rachel and tell her something important lol

And I must pack for Spring Break which officially started today, I was planning on heading home tommarow but now I probably won't make it back until Saturday.

I also have too much to do over Spring Break hahaha.  I am such a busy bee, I don't know how I will fit everything in!!!!!!

Its so warm I am probably going to wear a skirt tommarow!!!!!

I am sick, I need to go to the doctor because my chest is congested like whoa and my chest hurts and I like wheeze when I try to breath deeply lol

I can't go to the doctor because I am a part-time student at VCU and therefore didn't pay the health fee and can't go to the clinic.  I could go to a doctor and use my parents insurance but I know absolutly nothing about the doctors in Richmond and have no idea where to go.

Whoaaa they are playing like a remix of Somebody Like You on 93.1, interesting lol, the guitar part is like different.  Actually I think this is the remix for How to Loose A Guy in 10 Days, I forgot that Keith like redid it so it was less banjo and more guitar or something lol

haha now he's singing about the running in circles and that reminded me of me and Maggie driving aroudn the traffic circle listening to that.  I told my parents that when they came down and they laughed at me.

Spring Break is next week-yay- but that means I have a test in all my classes this week so I have tons of reading and studying to do boo.

The housing situation is not looking good.  If we do get a house it will probably be in Orgeon Hill like 2 blocks behind Ashley.  It would be me and Joy and somebody else because Emily says she won't live over there and Ainsley is living with Emily and this is only a 3 bedroom so it wouldn't be all 4 of us.  But it has a fenced in back yard- perfect for a cute little dog which me and Joy decided we would get if we had that house- we are going to rescue a little fluffy dog from the shelter!!!  yay!

in other news my parents are coming this weekend to look at houses hurrayyyyyy!!

Buying too many movies and smoothies ahhaha that kind of rhymes.

Remax decided to send us a letter today saying that we have to notify them by next week if we are renewing our lease or not.  My dad's not coming down until the weekend after that to look at houses.  Way to go Remax for giving us a week to make a major decision that could leave us homeless lol.

So we probably aren't renewing our lease.  I really am not a fan of this apartment.  If my dad doesn't buy a house I would rather get an apartment somewhere else but Joy likes it here.  Either way I think we aren't because we might move into the Harrison house because like everyone is graduating except Brittany that lives there.  Just not sure how that would work because there are a bunch of people that want to live there and I'm not sharing a room.

Going home this weekend and I get to see my kitties and my puppy!!!!!  Yay!!!

Ate at Tropical Smoothie and Taco Bell and made truffles yum yum.  Went to the Rite-Aid on campus and found cadburr eggs- yay!!!!

anyways today has been good but I think I am getting sick so I am going to bed soon and then I will sleep in tommarow because I don't have class until 12:45

eeeepppppp!!!  Great mood!

I am staying at VCU my dad said he might buy a house and rent it out to me and my friends!

KEITH URBAN IS NEXT THURSDAY!!!  MAGGIE AND I ARE SOOO GETTING ON STAGE THIS TIME!!!!!

Going to see Rent tonight yay!!!!!

hmmm today was good

Went to education class and it is probably my favorite class this semester.

Went to Bakers Cruse with Rachel and Amanda who I love and haven't seen in forever!  We had crepes and they were yummy!

Made my chicken casserole thing for dinner.

Lost was a rerun but it was okay because I got to hang out with my roomies + Brian + Emily + Jason and then we watched project runway and it was fabulous.

Now I am here in my sauna of a room, it is ridiculously hot.  We think its because people are redoing the flooring in the halls so they have the door open and its messing up the thermostat so the heat is on like way too much.

Anyways 2 classes tommarow then going home for the Superbowl and to see my dad because hes coming back from the Phillipines.
yay look how pretty i made it!!!

I have decided what my summer job should be.

I am going to be Keith Urban's trip planner.  I am going to hang out with him while he is on his tour bus and plan all sorts of fun things to do.  Like we can make baked tortellini and make a scrapbook and even play video games.

I will also plan side trips that we can go to on our way from one place to the next.  For example we can visit the Grand Canyon and whatever other fun places there are that you can visit on a fun roadtrip. Like next time he came to Richmond I would take him to Belle Isle.  I haven't worked out the details yet but as soon as they hire me I can start looking up stuff online.

And instead of having to go eat at Outback, I will have my own personal gorgeous Austrailian to cook "outback" food for me. 

By the end of his tour he will have fallen madley in love with me and will bring me out on stage at the last concert of the tour and propose to me and all the girls will be jealous.

We will then plan a huge wedding in DC somewhere, like at the White House, because if I am marrying Keith Urban I can get married anywhere I want to, and then we will go honeymooning in Europe and then stop in Australia on our way back to the US so he can visit some of his old mates from the outback.

Then we will come back to the states where he can record a new album full of love songs that he wrote about me.

I hate school, I hate Richmond.

I really don't know what to do next semester, as much as I hate Richmond and VCU I also really love my friends here and I would be really miss them if I transfered.

Well this weekend was fun even though nothing went as planned.

Maggie has mono so she is dying and couldn't come to West Virginia to go to my grandparents and see Thomas's reeneactment.

So I called my family to see if anyone wanted to go and my brother said he would go with me.  So Friday after class, I went and got a massage which was wonderful.  Then I went to Belle Isle with Emily Fisher and we climbed around on the rocks for a while and then I came back packed my bags and went home to get my brother.

The plan was to sleep at my house Friday night and then drive up to the reenactment and then to my grandparents Saturday after my brother was done with his fencing class. But he got back at like 1:45 and the battle started at 2:30 and it takes like an hour to get there and he still had to shower and pack.  So we decided to go to the one on Sunday instead.

So we drove up to my grandparents house and chilled with them Sat night and then on Sunday went to Thomas's reenactment.  It was really fun lol.  But we couldn't find Thomas but thats okay.  Then we drove back to my house and I ate dinner there and then got back down to VCU just in time to watch Desperate Housewives with my roomies + Brian lol.

Maybe go thrift store shopping in search of a halloween costume- I am a 60s prom queen, maggie is 50s prom queen and emily fisher is 70s prom queen lol! I heart american dreams!!

My grandpa just sent me an update on Brian

Update is for: Brian Keenan
Update information: The NOLS office just spoke with the Keenan family and told 
them that even though they haven't physically spoken with  
the team, they know that the team is ahead of the game on  
their course.  They are past the area of the earthquake  
and mudslides and the senior team is covering the same  
course to make sure everything has gone as planned.  This  
senior team should know something for sure by tomorrow and  
by Friday they are to expect a call from Brian directly.   
2 of the team members are sick but they knew that Brian  
was fine.  There is no indication thus far of any damage  
to the team or even that they know that there has been an  
earthquake.  They are in the Nada Devi Area of the  
Himalaya Mountains now and somewhere in the Kinnaur  
Valley.  Brian is supposed to be going to Randihkett  
though, where there is some damage.  Some of this might  
sound questionable or vague but we should have a better  
understanding on Friday.  The Keenans are feeling much  
better about the situation since this call...even though  
they haven't had direct word from them yet...and  
appreciate all of our prayers.

My grandpa just sent me this

Prayer request: The Keenans got word this afternoon that the earthquake  that
hit India, Afganistan and Pakistan was near the area  
where Brian has been on the mountaineering expedition with  
the NOLS program.  Please be in prayer for his safety and  
testimony to others during this time.  The NOLS  
organization has not yet been able to get in contact with  
the.  Please pray that this happens soon. Brian is due to  
come back to the states on Wednesday, October 19th.


Brian is a friend from my old church, please pray for his saftey.
